title: Torque about the axel of a horizontal disk

content.question: A horizontal disk is free to rotate about an axle at its center. The labeled arrows in the figure represent forces of equal magnitude that are exerted on the edge of the disk in the directions shown. Which of the following correctly ranks the magnitude <math alttext="tau" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of the torque about the axle exerted by each force?

choices.label: <math alttext="tau sub A, equals tau sub B, which equals tau sub C, which equals tau sub D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="tau sub A, is greater than tau sub D, which is greater than, open parenthesis, tau sub B, which equals tau sub C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, tau sub A, equals tau sub B, which equals tau sub D, close parenthesis, which is greater than tau sub C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, tau sub B equals tau sub C, close parenthesis, which is greater than tau sub D, which is greater than tau sub A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="tau sub A, is greater than tau sub D, which is greater than, open parenthesis, tau sub B, which equals tau sub C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>τ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
